-- DaoM_Workflow_D3_Update -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 UPDATE [M_Workflow] SET
[Id] = @Set_Id_forUPD, [SubSystemId] = @Set_SubSystemId_forUPD, [WorkflowName] = @Set_WorkflowName_forUPD, [WfPositionId] = @Set_WfPositionId_forUPD, [WorkflowNo] = @Set_WorkflowNo_forUPD, [FromUserId] = @Set_FromUserId_forUPD, [ActionType] = @Set_ActionType_forUPD, [ToUserId] = @Set_ToUserId_forUPD, [ToUserPositionTitlesId] = @Set_ToUserPositionTitlesId_forUPD, [NextWfPositionId] = @Set_NextWfPositionId_forUPD, [NextWorkflowNo] = @Set_NextWorkflowNo_forUPD, [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] = @Set_CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow_forUPD, [MailTemplateId] = @Set_MailTemplateId_forUPD, [ReserveArea] = @Set_ReserveArea_forUPD,
WHERE AND [Id] = @IdAND [Id] IS NULL AND [SubSystemId] = @SubSystemIdAND [SubSystemId] IS NULL AND [WorkflowName] = @WorkflowNameAND [WorkflowName] IS NULL AND [WfPositionId] = @WfPositionIdAND [WfPositionId] IS NULL AND [WorkflowNo] = @WorkflowNoAND [WorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [FromUserId] = @FromUserIdAND [FromUserId] IS NULL AND [ActionType] = @ActionTypeAND [ActionType] IS NULL AND [ToUserId] = @ToUserIdAND [ToUserId] IS NULL AND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] = @ToUserPositionTitlesIdAND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] IS NULL AND [NextWfPositionId] = @NextWfPositionIdAND [NextWfPositionId] IS NULL AND [NextWorkflowNo] = @NextWorkflowNoAND [NextWorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] = @CorrespondOfReplyWorkflowAND [CorrespondOfReplyWorkflow] IS NULL AND [MailTemplateId] = @MailTemplateIdAND [MailTemplateId] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL
